mng: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain, variant of 煉|炼[lian4]

exm.mng: to extract (ore, minerals etc), to refine, to purify, to process
to engage in physical exercise, to work out, to toughen, to temper
to refine (a substance), to purify, to refine (one's skills, writing etc), refined, polished, succinct, skilled, capable
(of Taoists) to practice austerities, to practice asceticism
